segments.text: We have reservations for two at your restaurant tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm calling to see if I can request a specific table .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can try to arrange that for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I proposed to my wife in your restaurant and I would like the same table if I can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you describe for me , where you were sitting ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was a little table by the bay windows overlooking the wharf .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're in luck . We still have that little table .
segments.speaker: S2
